summary: An email forwarded within the FBI on July 12, 2019, in which Richmond FBI Special Agent M shares a message from hedge fund manager Whitney Tilson. Tilson offers to provide information relevant to the Jeffrey Epstein investigation and requests to be connected with the appropriate investigators.

persons.name: Whitney Tilson
persons.context: Reaches out to FBI Special Agent M, offering information relevant to the Jeffrey Epstein investigation. Previously provided useful information on a corporate fraud case in 2015.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The individual under investigation by the FBI, to whom the offered information pertains.

persons.name: Special Agent M
persons.context: FBI agent in the Richmond Division who received the initial email from Whitney Tilson and forwarded it to colleagues in New York working on the Epstein case.

connections.description: Tilson is a past informant who provided useful information to Agent M on a corporate fraud case in 2015, and is now reaching out again regarding the Epstein investigation.
Tilson claims to have information that would be of interest to investigators looking into Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Past cooperation on corporate fraud case
events.description: Whitney Tilson provided useful information to FBI Special Agent M on an unspecified corporate fraud case.

events.title: Tilson offers Epstein information
events.description: Whitney Tilson emails FBI Special Agent M, offering to provide information relevant to the ongoing Jeffrey Epstein investigation and requesting to be connected with the right investigators.

keyFacts: On July 12, 2019, hedge fund manager Whitney Tilson contacted the FBI, offering information relevant to the Jeffrey Epstein investigation.
Tilson had a prior established relationship with FBI Special Agent M, having provided useful information on a corporate fraud case in 2015.
The email was forwarded internally within the FBI from the Richmond Division to colleagues in New York handling the Epstein case.
The communication indicates an active effort by the FBI to gather information from external sources regarding Jeffrey Epstein in mid-2019.
